code: import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import{ThemeContext}from'../../ThemeContext';import'./registerPopup.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RegisterPopup=_ref=>{let{show,onClose,onOpenLogin}=_ref;const{isDarkMode,selectedLanguage}=useContext(ThemeContext);if(!show){return null;}const translations={english:{login:'Login',confirm:'Confirm',register:'Register',username:'Username',email:'Email',password:'Password',confirmPassword:'Confirm Password'},polish:{login:'Zaloguj się',confirm:'Potwierdź',register:'Zarejestruj się',username:'Nazwa użytkownika',email:'Email',password:'Hasło',confirmPassword:'Potwierdź hasło'}};const ".concat(isDarkMode?'dark-mode':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"close-icon",onClick:onClose,children:"X"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:t.register}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:t.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email",name:"email",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",children:t.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"username",name:"username",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:t.password}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",name:"password",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"confirmPassword",children:t.confirmPassword}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"confirmPassword",name:"confirmPassword",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"toggle-mode-button",onClick:onOpenLogin,children:t.login}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"confirm-button",children:t.confirm})]})]})]})});};export
